doc:
Ralph Wright https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ralph_Wright 0 Ralph Waldo Wright (May 17, 1908 – December 31, 1983) was a Disney animator and story/storyboard writer who provided the gloomy, sullen voice of Eeyore from the popular Winnie the Pooh franchise. Ralph_Waldo_Wright ( May_17_,_1908 – December_31_,_1983 ) was a_Disney_animator_and_story/storyboard_writer who provided the_gloomy_,_sullen_voice of Eeyore from the_popular_Winnie the_Pooh_franchise .
